title: Loving Hut
typeOfFood: Vegan, Chinese, International, Western, Fast food, Take-out, Catering
description: Part of international chain of vegan restaurants opened by followers of Supreme Master Ching Hai, an advocate for veg living. Serves vegan food, coffee, non-alcoholic beverages, vegan desserts. Has kids menu. Last order 2:15pm, 9:15pm. No reservations on weekends or holidays. For catering call 97874389.
